full_summary:
### Roof Replacement – Design Build, Agassiz Research and Development Centre, Agassiz, BC

#### Tender Invitation

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada invites interested contractors to participate in the Roof Replacement - Design Build project, which involves the replacement of the existing roof on Building 20 at the Agassiz Research and Development Centre in Agassiz, BC.

#### Project Description

The current roof has been leaking for several years, and recent years have seen an increase in the severity of the leaks, impacting the interior of the building. The replacement roof is expected to provide a minimum 30-year service life with leak-free performance. The project involves the removal of the existing roofing and the design, supply, and installation of new standing seam metal roofing.

#### Mandatory Site Visit

A mandatory site visit will be held on July 18, 2023, at 10:00 AM (Local Agassiz Time), at the Agassiz Research and Development Centre. Interested bidders are expected to attend and sign in prior to conducting a thorough assessment of the building.

#### Key Project Dates

- **Tender Closing Date:** August 1, 2023, at 13:00:00
- **Construction Start Date:** As per project agreement
- **Construction Completion Date:** On or before March 31, 2024

#### Tenders and Evaluation

Tenders will be evaluated based on variations or combinations of the methods outlined in the tender package. Interested bidders are required to submit their tenders by the specified deadline.

#### Pre-award Requirements

- Interested contractors are expected to attend the mandatory site visit.
- Tenders must be submitted on the Canada Buys website.

#### Contact Information

For further information, please contact Desta Kissack at (204) 583-8127 or desta.kissack@agr.gc.ca.

### Important Documents

To access the tender package, trade agreements, and other relevant information, please visit the Canada Buys website.
